column1: # Добавить сюда своих вопросов. Эту строку надо пропустить при настройке CsvToBean (withSkipLines)

Is the climate crisis the most serious global threat today?|Yes%true

Is English the dominant language in international business relations?|Yes%true
Will electric vehicle technology dominate the automotive industry?|Yes%true
